title: Contra Costa Measure X
description: A half-cent sales tax increase that would run for 30 years and would be used for transportation improvements.

title: Santa Clara Measure B
description: A half-cent sales tax projected to raise more than $6 billion over the next 30 years for public transit.

title: Berkeley Measure T1
description: A $100 million general obligation bond for Berkeley's infrastructure.

title: Albany Measure O1
description: A penny an ounce tax on sugary drinks.

title: Oakland Measure HH
description: A penny an ounce tax on sugary drinks.
